Bishwa Prakash Puri

Assistant Professor, Environmental Consultant, and International Education Advisor

Summary

Highly motivated and interdisciplinary professional leveraging deep expertise in climate-hydrology interactions, geospatial analysis (GIS/RS), and sustainable development policy. Proven experience in delivering rigorous academic research, executing complex Environmental Impact Assessments (EIA/IEE), and providing certified, results-oriented guidance for international education pathways.

Core Expertise

Technical & Scientific

  • Hydrologic Modeling (SWAT, HEC-HMS)
  • GIS & Remote Sensing (ArcGIS Pro, QGIS, GEE)
  • Climate Change Modeling (Downscaling)
  • Statistical Analysis (R, Python, SPSS)
  • Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA/IEE)

Strategic & Advisory

  • Policy Analysis & Adaptation Planning
  • International Education Strategy (USA, UK, Australia)
  • Grant Writing & Proposal Development
  • Academic Research Mentorship
  • Business Development & Stakeholder Management

Languages & Certification

  • **Nepali:** Native
  • **English:** Full professional proficiency (IELTS Certified)
  • **Certified Consultant:** TITI, Government of Nepal
  • **Software:** MS Office, LaTeX, Tableau
